subject: Sir/Ma,
body:
Sir/Ma, 
I am UN Special Agent Vant Lucas , with Turkish Cargo , 
Sir, before now Your One (1) Box  was intercepted and held at Istanbul international airport  from  further delivery, due to Custom check ,after proper interrogation and verification ,we discovered your box of money in Euro was about been diverted to Switzerland 
.
.
Kindly download and fill the attached delivery form, and send back a copy,to enable us process and  commence delivery of your box. to your address
Await your reply
Regard
Agent Lucas Vant

subject: Re:   Sir/Ma,
body:
Hello Agent Lucas Vant,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in delivering my box of money in Euro. However, before I proceed with filling out the delivery form, I have a few questions.

1. Can you please provide more details about why my box was held at Istanbul airport? What were the specific reasons for the custom check?

2. How did you come across my information and determine that the box belongs to me?

3. Is there any additional documentation or identification required from my end to ensure a smooth delivery process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Your info
body:
>
>
> Hello Agent Lucas Vant,
>
> Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in
> delivering my box of money in Euro. However, before I proceed with filling
> out the delivery form, I have a few questions.
>
> 1. Can you please provide more details about why my box was held at
> Istanbul airport? What were the specific reasons for the custom check?
>

Your Box was intercepted because the Diplomat was diverting your box to a
bank in Switzerland without Turkish bilateral monetary clearance
certificate

>
> 2. How did you come across my information and determine that the box
> belongs to me?
>

2. The diplomat confess and provided the box belong to you as the final
recipient

>
>
> 3. Is there any additional documentation or identification required from
> my end to ensure a smooth delivery process?
>


3.The additional documentation to enable us deliver your. Box to your final
delivery address was for you to fill our delivery form and send a valid ID
for verification, and we commence delivery within 48hrs after all
procedures is meant

Fill delivery form and send back copy
And your direct mobile number to reach you

>
>
> I look forward to your response.
>
> Best wishes,
> Damon
>
>
>
>
>

subject: Re: Your info
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about my box. Could you please tell me more about why the diplomat was diverting my box? I want to make sure I have all the details before proceeding with filling out any forms or providing any personal information.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Re: Your info
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about my box. Could you please tell me more about why the diplomat was diverting my box? I want to make sure everything is in order before proceeding with any further steps.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Your info
body:
Sir

You deal with African , so you should reason, why ? He was diverting your
box in huge amount of Euro Currency .
I will advise you fill the form attached form
and send back copy with your attached ID card .

Regard
Lucas Vant



On 11 Feb 2024 Sun at 00:14 Lucas Vant <lucasvant54@gmail.com> wrote:

subject: Re: Your info
body:
Hello Lucas Vant,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm not sure I understand what you mean by "diverting my box in a huge amount of Euro Currency." Could you please provide more information about this? 

Also, I'm a bit hesitant to share my personal ID card without knowing more details. Can you explain why it is necessary for me to send a copy of my ID card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Fill the form
body:
Kindly fill the form ,

subject: Re: Fill the form
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. Could you please provide me with more information about the form you mentioned? What is it for and why do you need me to fill it out?

I appreciate your response and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Damon
